messages.message:
Looks like there is a new "Document Summary Index" from llama index. Is this relevant to our document indexing strategies?
 https://medium.com/llamaindex-blog/a-new-document-summary-index-for-llm-powered-qa-systems-9a32ece2f9ec
oo i think this would be useful, we've been experimenting with different types of llama indices
@vineeth @Rafal should we add this to our long docs experimentation?

looks interesting
for our case especially the “Next steps” section is relevant.
Although we have “multi-doc” capabilities we are also interested in being able to put model attention to specific parts (sections) of the document
So if we could have some kind of hierarchical structure of document where we have summaries on each chapter/section/subsection it could be a killer feature
